reference.title: environment variables
reference.shortdesc: View a table that documents the available environment variables and their purpose.

desc.p: The table lists the environment variables with two columns providing the name and the purpose.

row.entry: Used in some tools as path to the libary libopencryptoki.so. You should never change this variable. Maybe useful for debugging information.
Specifies the path to the . Only of interest, if multiple libraries are installed. Normally, you should never change this variable. Maybe useful for debugging information.
The standard path for the token-specific is /etc/opencryptoki/. You can change this path by using this variable.
Specifies the path to the main directory. Never change this variable. Maybe useful for debugging information.
Used for pointing to the SHM-Key Files. Only of interest, if you run multiple slot manager daemons (pkcsslotd).
Provides a possibility to transfer the User PIN to the p11sak utility. It is required for running the tests.
Enables logging support. If the environment variable is not set, logging is disabled by default.
